Makes a simple profile or distro object name that 'd fit our cobbler naming convention

Parameters:

Returns:

makeCobblerFileName

public static java.lang.String makeCobblerFileName(java.lang.String label,
                                                   Org org)
Makes a local file path out of the cobbler name. Currently ends up in : /var/lib/rhn/kickstarts/label--orgid--orgname.cfg

Parameters:
label - the distro or profile label
org - the org to appropriately add the org info
Returns:
the cobbler file name in /var/lib/rhn/kickstarts/label--orgid--orgname.cfg
